original_title: POZ Talk: A Mga Batang POZ Primer
overview: Karen Davila leads an in-depth discussion on “Mga Batang Poz” and the growing number of HIV cases in the country. Author Jun Matias, actors from the said series and real life HIV patients join in the conversation to take part in creating HIV awareness.
title: POZ Talk: A Mga Batang POZ Primer
